Dear Modiji. I am your strong follower since 2002. I highly appreciate the efforts and challenging initiatives you take to develop India. The lobby working against your goverment is trying hard to defame you. We know it will take a few years to streamline and stabilise things as it was in a worst stage when you took charge as PM. Some immediate measure that will reduce the cost of living of poor, low and medium income group is expected from the government.  After implementing GST the prices of goods and services should have fallen but it increased. The companies supplying goods have added the new tax rate with the MRP of goods which was already inclusive of tax. They should have deducted the old tax from MRP and then add the new GST rate. That's how the prices of many goods rised instead of falling. For example a particular brand of rice which costed Rs.75 is now Rs.86 per kg. Is there any RTI to know how they increased the price with so much difference. Same case is with many necessary commodities.

Even after six months of passing Goods and Services Tax (GST), manufacturers, and traders are continuing to fleece customers.  They charge GST  on Maximum Retail Price (MRP), which includes "all taxes".  Selling a product over and above MRP is a violation of the anti-profiteering clauses of the GST Act.   This may lead to cancellation of registration of the retailer.  But retailers say the government has given companies time till 30 September to clear unsold pre-GST goods.  So till October 1, consumers will have to pay the old taxes, and GST as well!!
